scripts.preinstall: node -e "if(!/bun/.test(process.env.npm_execpath||''))throw new Error('Use bun install, not npm/yarn')"
scripts.dev:local: bunx convex dev --once && concurrently -r bun:dev:web bun:dev:convex
scripts.dev:prod: bash -c 'set -a; [ -f .env.production ] && source .env.production; set +a; if [ -z "$CONVEX_DEPLOY_KEY" ]; then echo "❌ CONVEX_DEPLOY_KEY not set. Create .env.production with CONVEX_DEPLOY_KEY=your-key"; exit 1; fi && bunx convex dev --once && concurrently -r "vite dev" "bunx convex dev"'
scripts.dev:convex:prod: bash -c 'set -a; [ -f .env.production ] && source .env.production; set +a; if [ -z "$CONVEX_DEPLOY_KEY" ]; then echo "❌ CONVEX_DEPLOY_KEY not set. Create .env.production with CONVEX_DEPLOY_KEY=your-key"; exit 1; fi && bunx convex dev'
scripts.build:prod: bash -c 'source ~/.convex-deployments-mydashboard 2>/dev/null || true; if [ -z "$CONVEX_URL_PROD" ] || [ "$CONVEX_URL_PROD" = "YOUR_PROD_URL_HERE" ]; then echo "❌ CONVEX_URL_PROD not set. Run: bun run setup:deployments"; exit 1; fi && echo "VITE_CONVEX_URL=$CONVEX_URL_PROD" > .env.local && bunx convex deploy --prod -y && vite build'
scripts.start:prod: bash -c 'source ~/.convex-deployments-mydashboard 2>/dev/null || true; if [ -z "$CONVEX_URL_PROD" ] || [ "$CONVEX_URL_PROD" = "YOUR_PROD_URL_HERE" ]; then echo "❌ CONVEX_URL_PROD not set. Run: bun run setup:deployments"; exit 1; fi && echo "VITE_CONVEX_URL=$CONVEX_URL_PROD" > .env.local && bunx convex deploy --prod -y && vite build'
